name: Exo Space 3D
description:
This is my 3D First Person Shooter project.

Modifications:

  1. Created 3 complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  2. Modified the out-of-game menus: created new buttons, backdrops and game logo in PhotoShop.
  3. Slightly changed the camera rotation script in the Main Menu.
  4. Made 3 new kinds of weapons in 3Ds Max and replaced the existed weapons with the ones that I made myself. 
  5. Added 3 new types of keys and locks designed and created by myself in 3Ds Max. .
  6. Created new tonels and shelters and additional objects complete with animated states in 3Ds Max, and added them all to the game.
  7. Replaced the skyboxes.
  8. Added planets and commets with the commet spawners.
  9.  Replaced all types of pickups with the new ones that I created in 3Ds Max.
  10. Slightly changed the lives display script.
  11. Completly changed and baked my own lighting.
  12. Added custom music to my game. I created 4 different melodies (menu theme and melody for each level) in FL studio.
  13.  Modified the in-game GUI, created new icons for the weapons and lives display.

Credits:

Created by Yaroslav Musiychuk
